title: Pagrindinis turinys
content:
This is LeBron James:
He is THE GOAT.
Here is Fibonacci sequence code (get sequence number by index) in Kotlin:
fun fibonacciSequenceFast(index: Int): Int { if (index <= 1){ return index } var arr: Array<Int> = arrayOf(0, 1) var i = 1 do { i++ arr += (arr[i - 1] + arr[i - 2]) } while (index != i) return arr[index] }
